title: Why can't we earn mastery tokens on Twisted Treeline??
body:
Okay so like, why can't we earn mastery tokens on Twisted Treeline? The map is equally as hard as Summoners Rift but whenever I get an S or S+ it doesn't give me the token. If there isn't any reason why it shouldn't be added, I would like it to be added into the game as I know a lot of people (including myself) who play Twisted more than Summoners. It would be a great convenience to us as we have to go over to Summoners to earn our tokens. 

_Sincerley
Kingjosiah8    {{champion:6}} _
